title: Scott Peterson's back: Will A&E docuseries set him free?
itunes:title: Scott Peterson's back: Will A&E docuseries set him free?
description:
Scott Peterson's pushing the idea that investigators ignored witness tips that would have proven he did not murder wife Laci and unborn son Conner. A new docuseries that purports to reveal new evidence begins this week on A&E. Nancy Grace, psychologist Dr. Bethany Marshall and journalist Sean Walsh watched the first episode and talk about it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
